title: Wicked witch Halloween punch
ingredients: ['Frozen hand', '8 leaves gelatine', '600ml water', 'Spiced ginger syrup', '125ml water', '100g caster sugar', '50g peeled and thinly sliced root ginger', '2 cinnamon sticks', '5 whole cloves', 'Punch', '2 litres chilled dark coloured juice, such as pomegranate, cranberry or dark grape', '2 litres chilled sparkling water', '300ml chilled dark rum or vodka (optional)']
